data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mathis, Wayne N., Zatwarnicki, Tadeusz (2012): Revision of New World Species of the Shore-fly Subgenus Allotrichoma Becker of the Genus Allotrichoma with Description of the Subgenus Neotrichoma (Diptera, Ephydridae, Hecamedini). ZooKeys 161: 1-101, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.161.2016, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.161.2016
